title: Vue Best Practices
abstract: Comprehensive performance optimization guide for Vue 2/3 and Nuxt applications, designed for AI agents and LLMs. Contains 46 rules across 10 categories, prioritized by impact from critical (eliminating waterfalls, reducing bundle size) to incremental (advanced patterns). Each rule includes detailed explanations, real-world examples comparing incorrect vs. correct implementations, and Vue 2/3 compatibility notes to guide automated refactoring and code generation.

async.name: Eliminate Async Waterfalls
async.description: Avoid sequential async operations, eliminate request waterfalls through parallel requests, preloading, and smart data fetching

bundle.name: Bundle Size Optimization
bundle.description: Reduce JavaScript bundle size through code splitting, tree-shaking, dynamic imports, and third-party library optimization

server.name: Server-Side Performance
server.description: Optimize SSR/SSG performance, including caching strategies, parallel data fetching, and server-side rendering optimization

client.name: Client-Side Data Fetching
client.description: Optimize client-side API calls and data fetching strategies, reduce unnecessary requests

reactivity.name: Reactivity Optimization
reactivity.description: Optimize Vue's reactivity system usage, including proper use of computed and watch

rendering.name: Rendering Performance
rendering.description: Optimize component rendering performance, including virtual scrolling, conditional rendering, keep-alive, etc.

vue2.name: Vue 2 Specific Optimization
vue2.description: Performance optimization techniques specific to Vue 2

vue3.name: Vue 3 Specific Optimization
vue3.description: Performance optimization techniques specific to Vue 3
